subject: p12185775
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study performed six hours earlier. ET tube has been repositioned, now the tip is in standard position, 46 cm above the carina. Diffuse lung opacities have worsened in the left lower lobe, this new focal opacity in the left lower lobe could be due to atelectasis and or aspiration.
